html:
4.6.19  2:07 pm   I'm going through some heavy shit. Could you please tell me everything will be alright? 

     if you want me to tell you without knowing any of the details, then you must already know

4.6.19  1:50 pm   this used to be an insightful page into your mind , likings and such. now you only answer to shitty insecure self help questions, why is that?

     if they could help themselves then why are they asking me

4.6.19  1:20 pm   The vast majority of songs could be improved by making them faster.

     that may be true

      I have heard of countless examples of songs that were made far more popular when a band did a cover/remix that was faster than the original, but zero examples of songs with more popular covers/remixes that are slower.

     there is a jaco pastorius sample (portrait of tracy) that was turned into a hip hop sample and used many times, at a slower tempo. there are other examples but i can't think of them

4.6.19  12:32 pm   i wonder what your laugh sounds like?  you make so much funny stuff but the punchlines are all jingles, text, or delivered in an understated tone.  just curious, that's all

     what does yours sound like

4.6.19  11:43 am   i was just watching some cutscenes from this game, and they made me cry. they were so lovely and sentimental. and bill please don't take this the wrong way, but i feel that you're actually quite unsentimental. especially as of late. you seem so guarded and brittle. you probably wouldn't like to answer this question, and that's okay. and im not telling you your business. but i am curious about your softness. i know it's there... and i hope so dearly that you're not neglecting it. somehow, you seem both happy and jaded. i am concerned for your gentleness.

     almost anything can make me cry instantly. super sick crane camera shots make me cry

4.6.19  11:41 am   "let it go" and "just do it" have the same underlying meaning but it's just worded differently to relate to different audiences, i keep noticing an underlying pattern in everything i look at, people try to inspire each other in each genre and it's the same advice but it's just worded different and it seems to all boil down to saying yes to doing new things, trying new things, challenging ourselves, then adapting to the new environment, i guess that's what evolution is. when was the last time you pushed yourself to try something new outside of your comfort zone where you had to adapt?

     apr 7, 2019

4.6.19  10:52 am   What music do you find yourself listening to,

     the devil's music

      and can you point to any songs/artists that you cite as an inspiration?

     for he's a jolly good fellow, christian remix

4.6.19  6:47 am   where do you keep your car if you live in a rented apartment

     in the closet, perhaps

4.6.19  5:58 am   i have no other question than how was your day

     it's not mine, i am on a 'shared day' program, but it is medium. it's also not over

4.6.19  5:48 am   and btw im binging on your vids instead of doing maths is that good

     sure

4.6.19  5:38 am   hey bill im taking the most important exam in my life rn real scared wt shld i do

     do the best you can

4.6.19  2:31 am   do you not fear missing out?

     i don't not

4.6.19  1:05 am   I am impatient. I told myself not to be, but then I still was can you help me understand how to be more better at being more patient 

     i think it would help if you find other things to do while you are waiting for what you are waiting for

4.6.19  12:17 am   Why do you answer all these questions?

     why are they asked

4.5.19  11:07 pm   do you think life is cool?

     yes, and hot

4.5.19  11:03 pm   I have difficulty passing smoothly for prima voce to falsetto, and singing a lot around that area makes my voice sound bad. How you used to overcome this problem? I've been stuck in this for a very long time...

     editing?

4.5.19  9:44 pm   when you come up with parts for your songs do you just compose them straight into the program or compose them on the instrument

     the songs are composed on only 1 instrument, and text. when recording the songs, the decisions are made straight into the song mostly

4.5.19  9:21 pm   Why can't you play strumming guitar?

     i can

4.5.19  9:03 pm   how do i increase the number of polygons in my life

     begin shopping around for a polygon duplication service

4.5.19  8:46 pm   what is comedy?

      'normalcy'

4.5.19  8:08 pm   why do people say life is about using the whole box of crayons but i can't find the right colors or blend them

     yea you need a microwave also

4.5.19  7:42 pm   do you ever plan on doing a meet and greet?

     meet, not greet

      If so, any idea when or where?

     no

4.5.19  6:46 pm   when you take a journey how do you decide  where to go? 

     based on the reason for the journey. choose a place that fits with the reason for the journey

4.5.19  5:32 pm   I have to go back to my old elementary school to do some volunteer work. Any advice?

     first you must locate the school

4.5.19  5:17 pm   hi, is this the white house

     no

4.5.19  4:42 pm   where should i hide

     in plain sight

4.5.19  3:11 pm   why do hot things melt

     so they can dance better

4.5.19  1:34 pm   Is earth really flat

     fat. (typo)

4.5.19  12:20 pm   is bread a good source of fuel for my new table?

     yes, and the table in turn fuels the bread

4.5.19  12:19 pm   i really like kermit the frog. he is a really great guy, especially considering he is a frog. i love him with all of my heart. i know you like him too.

     i suppose

      what makes you like kermit the frog so much?

     i like him a medium amount but it is due to his medium nature i suppose. good pivot point, for the other characters

4.5.19  11:22 am   how many chairs do you have

     1 but i cloned it

4.5.19  11:20 am   so bill, how exactly does one do better in living?

     you could do it from a different vantage point

4.5.19  11:07 am   Do you think you'll eventually get so tired of people asking about the dates of the reality vids, that you'll make the production dates for each one more visible?

     then they will think the content is from then. i've been through this before, with youtube

4.5.19  8:41 am   what is the hostory of the earth?

     you'll never guess what shape it is. find out next

4.5.19  8:38 am   How do you get the ideas for your videos?

     go on a journey and then change the destination at the last minute

4.5.19  6:44 am   in some places i've looked, a deceptive cadence is described as the V going to the vi. But what if the V goes to the flat 6 major. Does that count as deceptive cadence. Actually what counts as a deceptive cadence in general

      only the listener knows, deep down, if they have been deceived

4.5.19  2:19 am   yeah, fuck living if it means i have to compete with people and sacrifice my sense of self. i'll pass. 

     competition might actually strengthen your sense of self. in fact it's what made us all who we are

4.5.19  1:46 am   sources of motivation?

     everything

4.5.19  12:53 am   is wanting to play music for my friends and myself a good reason to want to learn music

     sure

4.4.19  11:56 pm   If you had three wishes from a genie, what would you wish for?

     i want to know what the genie wishes for

4.4.19  10:52 pm   tips on writing cool bass lines?

     take care of the song

4.4.19  10:21 pm   How old were you when you started making music?

     2 i think

4.4.19  9:35 pm   how do i fix my microwave the thingy doesnt spin so can you help me

     pause 3 times during the process and rotate the item by hand

4.4.19  8:11 pm   what's triggering your creative hyperdrive?

     i think the big bang actually

4.4.19  7:19 pm   Are there any more scary pockets sessions that are going to come out?

     not until we do another one

4.4.19  7:15 pm   What time is it? Like in general

     now

4.4.19  6:52 pm   what is your opinion on    t h e    v o i d

     fake

4.4.19  6:11 pm   would you rather go crazy or go stupid?

     both would be fun

4.4.19  5:54 pm   Bill, I feel like I'm slowly losing hope and faith in humanity. Do you feel the same way?

     no

      And why?

     i've read a bit about their past accomplishments

4.4.19  5:38 pm   I had a nervous breakdown and felt like I was going to die. How do I stop this from happening?

     sing vocal patterns gently
